36  template <class PointType, class NormalType, class DescriptorType>
37  class Features{
38  private:
39  ros::NodeHandle _nh;
40  typedef pcl::PointCloud<PointType> PointCloudType;
41  typedef typename PointCloudType::Ptr PointCloudTypePtr;
42  typedef typename PointCloudType::ConstPtr PointCloudTypeConstPtr;
43 
44  // Variables
45  double _keypoint_sr;
46  double _norm_sr;
47  double _desc_sr;
48 
49  public:
50  Features(ros::NodeHandle nh, double normal_sr, double descriptor_sr, double keypoint_sr);
51  ~Features();
52  // Variables
53  typename pcl::PointCloud<PointType>::Ptr keypoints;
54  typename pcl::PointCloud<NormalType>::Ptr normals;
55  typename pcl::PointCloud<DescriptorType>::Ptr descriptor;
56  typename pcl::PointCloud<pcl::ReferenceFrame>::Ptr board;

77 nimbus::Features<PointType, NormalType, DescriptorType>::Features(ros::NodeHandle nh,
78  double normal_sr,
79  double descriptor_sr,

87 template <class PointType, class NormalType, class DescriptorType>
88 void nimbus::Features<PointType, NormalType, DescriptorType>::keypointUniformSampling(const PointCloudTypeConstPtr blob, pcl::PointCloud<PointType> &res)
89 {
90  pcl::UniformSampling<PointType> uniform;
91  uniform.setInputCloud(blob);
92  uniform.setRadiusSearch(_keypoint_sr);
93  typename pcl::PointCloud<PointType>::Ptr keypoint (new pcl::PointCloud<PointType>());
94  uniform.filter(*keypoint);
95  pcl::copyPointCloud(*keypoint, res);
96 }
97 
98 template <class PointType, class NormalType, class DescriptorType>
99 void nimbus::Features<PointType, NormalType, DescriptorType>::cloudNormalEstimationOMP(const PointCloudTypeConstPtr blob, pcl::PointCloud<NormalType> &res)
100 {
101  pcl::NormalEstimationOMP<PointType, NormalType> ne;
102  ne.setInputCloud(blob);
103  typename pcl::search::KdTree<PointType>::Ptr tree (new pcl::search::KdTree<PointType>());
104  ne.setSearchMethod(tree);
105  ne.setRadiusSearch(_norm_sr);
106  typename pcl::PointCloud<NormalType>::Ptr _normals (new pcl::PointCloud<NormalType>());
107  ne.compute(*_normals);
108  pcl::copyPointCloud(*_normals, res);
109 }
110 
111 template <class PointType, class NormalType, class DescriptorType>
112 void nimbus::Features<PointType, NormalType, DescriptorType>::cloudFPFHEstimation(const PointCloudTypeConstPtr blob, pcl::PointCloud<DescriptorType> &descriptor)
113 {
114  keypoints.reset(new pcl::PointCloud<PointType>());
115  normals.reset (new pcl::PointCloud<NormalType>());
116  keypointUniformSampling(blob, *keypoints);
117  cloudNormalEstimationOMP(blob, *normals);
118 
119  pcl::FPFHEstimationOMP<PointType, NormalType, DescriptorType> fpfh;
120  typename pcl::search::KdTree<PointType>::Ptr tree (new pcl::search::KdTree<PointType>);
121  fpfh.setSearchSurface(blob);
122  fpfh.setInputCloud(keypoints);
123  fpfh.setInputNormals(normals);
124  fpfh.setSearchMethod(tree);
125  fpfh.setRadiusSearch(_desc_sr);
126  typename pcl::PointCloud<DescriptorType>::Ptr _descriptor (new pcl::PointCloud<DescriptorType>());
127  fpfh.compute(*_descriptor);
128  pcl::copyPointCloud(*_descriptor, descriptor);
129 }
130 
131 template <class PointType, class NormalType, class DescriptorType>
132 void nimbus::Features<PointType, NormalType, DescriptorType>::cloudSHOTEstimationOMP(const PointCloudTypeConstPtr blob, pcl::PointCloud<DescriptorType> &descriptor)
133 {
134  keypoints.reset(new pcl::PointCloud<PointType>());
135  normals.reset (new pcl::PointCloud<NormalType>());
136  this->keypointUniformSampling(blob, *keypoints);
137  this->cloudNormalEstimationOMP(blob, *normals);
138 
139  pcl::SHOTEstimationOMP<PointType, NormalType, DescriptorType> shot;
140  shot.setNumberOfThreads(4);
141  shot.setRadiusSearch(_desc_sr);
142  shot.setInputCloud(keypoints);
143  shot.setInputNormals(normals);
144  shot.setSearchSurface(blob);
145  typename pcl::PointCloud<DescriptorType>::Ptr _descriptor (new pcl::PointCloud<DescriptorType>());
146  shot.compute(*_descriptor);
147  pcl::copyPointCloud(*_descriptor, descriptor);
148 }
149 
150 template <class PointType, class NormalType, class DescriptorType>
151 void nimbus::Features<PointType, NormalType, DescriptorType>::cloudBoardLocalRefeFrame(const PointCloudTypeConstPtr blob)
152 {
153  pcl::BOARDLocalReferenceFrameEstimation<PointType, NormalType, pcl::ReferenceFrame> rf_est;
154  rf_est.setFindHoles(true);
155  rf_est.setRadiusSearch(0.02);
156  rf_est.setInputCloud(this->keypoints);
157  rf_est.setInputNormals(this->normals);
158  rf_est.setSearchSurface(blob);
159  board.reset(new pcl::PointCloud<pcl::ReferenceFrame>());
160  rf_est.compute(*board);
161 }
162 
163 template <class PointType, class NormalType, class DescriptorType>
164 void nimbus::Features<PointType, NormalType, DescriptorType>::extraction(const PointCloudTypeConstPtr blob)
165 {
166  descriptor.reset(new pcl::PointCloud<DescriptorType>());
167  this->cloudSHOTEstimationOMP(blob, *descriptor);
168  this->cloudBoardLocalRefeFrame(blob);
